'''''Night of the Bats!''''' is the second installment of the {{WSC|0|1}} series, authored by [[Nick Eliopulos]].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|The adventures continue in the [[Minecraft]] Chapter Book series as five young Minecraft players find themselves transported inside the game they love. When [[zombie]] hordes attack them in the game, and [[Bats (Woodsword Chronicles)|bats]] invade their school in the real world, [[Ash Kapoor]], [[Morgan]], and their friends realize that it’s going to take all their talents to get to the bottom of these monstrous migrations. This illustrated hardcover series will thrill and engage fans of Minecraft and action-packed fantasy stories alike.|author=Description<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/602096/night-of-the-bats-minecraft-woodsword-chronicles-2-by-nick-eliopulos-illustrated-by-luke-flowers//|title=Night of the Bats! (Minecraft Woodsword Chronicles #2)|website=Penguin Random House}}</ref>}}
